mapper.sql: SELECT t1.CLPATH, t1.CLVERSION, t1.CODELISTID, t1.CODELISTNAME, t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.DEID, t11.DENAME, t1.EMPTYTEXT, t1.FILLER, t1.ISSYSTEM, t1.ISUSERSCOPE, t1.MEMO, t1.NOVALUEEMPTY, t1.ORMODE, t1.RESERVER, t1.RESERVER2, t1.RESERVER3, t1.RESERVER4, t1.RESERVER5, t1.SEPERATOR, t1.SRFSYSPUB, t1.SRFUSERPUB, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.VALUESEPERATOR FROM T_SRFCODELIST t1 LEFT JOIN t_srfdataentity t11 ON t1.DEID = t11.DEID

SELECT t1.`CLPATH`, t1.`CLVERSION`, t1.`CODELISTID`, t1.`CODELISTNAME`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`DEID`, t11.`DENAME`, t1.`EMPTYTEXT`, t1.`FILLER`, t1.`ISSYSTEM`, t1.`ISUSERSCOPE`, t1.`MEMO`, t1.`NOVALUEEMPTY`, t1.`ORMODE`, t1.`RESERVER`, t1.`RESERVER2`, t1.`RESERVER3`, t1.`RESERVER4`, t1.`RESERVER5`, t1.`SEPERATOR`, t1.`SRFSYSPUB`, t1.`SRFUSERPUB`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t1.`VALUESEPERATOR` FROM `T_CODELIST` t1 LEFT JOIN T_dataentity t11 ON t1.DEID = t11.DEID

SELECT t1.CLPATH, t1.CLVERSION, t1.CODELISTID, t1.CODELISTNAME, t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.DEID, t11.DENAME, t1.EMPTYTEXT, t1.FILLER, t1.ISSYSTEM, t1.ISUSERSCOPE, t1.MEMO, t1.NOVALUEEMPTY, t1.ORMODE, t1.RESERVER, t1.RESERVER2, t1.RESERVER3, t1.RESERVER4, t1.RESERVER5, t1.SEPERATOR, t1.SRFSYSPUB, t1.SRFUSERPUB, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.VALUESEPERATOR FROM T_CODELIST t1 LEFT JOIN T_dataentity t11 ON t1.DEID = t11.DEID

SELECT t1.CLPATH, t1.CLVERSION, t1.CODELISTID, t1.CODELISTNAME, t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.DEID, t11.DENAME, t1.EMPTYTEXT, t1.FILLER, t1.ISSYSTEM, t1.ISUSERSCOPE, t1.MEMO, t1.NOVALUEEMPTY, t1.ORMODE, t1.RESERVER, t1.RESERVER2, t1.RESERVER3, t1.RESERVER4, t1.RESERVER5, t1.SEPERATOR, t1.SRFSYSPUB, t1.SRFUSERPUB, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.VALUESEPERATOR FROM T_SRFCODELIST t1 LEFT JOIN t_srfdataentity t11 ON t1.DEID = t11.DEID

SELECT t1.CLPATH, t1.CLVERSION, t1.CODELISTID, t1.CODELISTNAME, t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.DEID, t11.DENAME, t1.EMPTYTEXT, t1.FILLER, t1.ISSYSTEM, t1.ISUSERSCOPE, t1.MEMO, t1.NOVALUEEMPTY, t1.ORMODE, t1.RESERVER, t1.RESERVER2, t1.RESERVER3, t1.RESERVER4, t1.RESERVER5, t1.SEPERATOR, t1.SRFSYSPUB, t1.SRFUSERPUB, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.VALUESEPERATOR FROM T_SRFCODELIST t1 LEFT JOIN t_srfdataentity t11 ON t1.DEID = t11.DEID

SELECT t1.[CLPATH], t1.[CLVERSION], t1.[CODELISTID], t1.[CODELISTNAME], t1.[CREATEDATE], t1.[CREATEMAN], t1.[DEID], t11.[DENAME], t1.[EMPTYTEXT], t1.[FILLER], t1.[ISSYSTEM], t1.[ISUSERSCOPE], t1.[MEMO], t1.[NOVALUEEMPTY], t1.[ORMODE], t1.[RESERVER], t1.[RESERVER2], t1.[RESERVER3], t1.[RESERVER4], t1.[RESERVER5], t1.[SEPERATOR], t1.[SRFSYSPUB], t1.[SRFUSERPUB], t1.[UPDATEDATE], t1.[UPDATEMAN], t1.[VALUESEPERATOR] FROM [T_SRFCODELIST] t1 LEFT JOIN t_srfdataentity t11 ON t1.DEID = t11.DEID

SELECT t1.`CLPATH`, t1.`CLVERSION`, t1.`CODELISTID`, t1.`CODELISTNAME`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`DEID`, t11.`DENAME`, t1.`EMPTYTEXT`, t1.`FILLER`, t1.`ISSYSTEM`, t1.`ISUSERSCOPE`, t1.`MEMO`, t1.`NOVALUEEMPTY`, t1.`ORMODE`, t1.`RESERVER`, t1.`RESERVER2`, t1.`RESERVER3`, t1.`RESERVER4`, t1.`RESERVER5`, t1.`SEPERATOR`, t1.`SRFSYSPUB`, t1.`SRFUSERPUB`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t1.`VALUESEPERATOR` FROM `T_CODELIST` t1 LEFT JOIN T_dataentity t11 ON t1.DEID = t11.DEID WHERE ( t1.`RESERVER3` = '1' )

SELECT t1.CLPATH, t1.CLVERSION, t1.CODELISTID, t1.CODELISTNAME, t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.DEID, t11.DENAME, t1.EMPTYTEXT, t1.FILLER, t1.ISSYSTEM, t1.ISUSERSCOPE, t1.MEMO, t1.NOVALUEEMPTY, t1.ORMODE, t1.RESERVER, t1.RESERVER2, t1.RESERVER3, t1.RESERVER4, t1.RESERVER5, t1.SEPERATOR, t1.SRFSYSPUB, t1.SRFUSERPUB, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.VALUESEPERATOR FROM T_CODELIST t1 LEFT JOIN T_dataentity t11 ON t1.DEID = t11.DEID WHERE ( t1.RESERVER3 = '1' )
